Posts.Content: Apr 4, 2012 02:57PM lauraslady wrote: I have chosen not to do the reconstructive surgery athough I am getting tired of being told I am in the wrong bathroom, or thats the womens bathroom but you can use it. Thinking seriously of making a t-shirt that says If I am in the wrong bathroom then so are you. The person that told me that that was the womens bathroom was a guard at a rest area in Alabama. I'm expecting one day to be arrested or at least detained at say Wal-Mart for using the womens bathroom and someone complains.
